tags.name: System
tags.description: Actions related to application as a whole.

tags.name: Dealer
tags.description: Actions related to the dealership record.

get.summary: Authenticate the user to the system.

parameters.name: deviceType
parameters.description: Allows the client to indicate if they are on the web or mobile.

get.summary: Creates text message and puts it in the outgoing queue.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Text Body for the text message.

parameters.name: date_start
parameters.description: Return list of text messages of Start date

parameters.name: date_end
parameters.description: Return list of text messages of end date

get.summary: Initiate a two way call between representative and dealer.
Fetch the available dealer phone numbers.
Download the call recording. Once a call record ID is provided, the backend fetches the file and forces a download on the client.
Fetch the current active Hertz user's phone numbers.
Fetch the current active Hertz user's call records.

post.summary: Search for dealers across multiple fields from a single keyword. Returns an array of dealers matching the format returned by /Dealer/dealer/list

email.summary: Email address of one of the users

post.summary: Check the credit limit with NextGear

nextgear_id.description: User supplied ID which connects this dealer to their NextGear account.

dealer_id.description: Internal unique ID of the dealership.

post.summary: Check the credit limit with AFC

afc_id.description: User supplied ID which connects this dealer to their AFC account.

dealer_id.description: Internal unique ID of the dealership.

post.summary: Check the credit limit with West Lake

westlake_id.description: User supplied ID which connects this dealer to their West Lake account.

dealer_id.description: Internal unique ID of the dealership.

post.summary: Determine the ability of the dealership to finance through Ally

ally_id.description: User supplied ID which connects this dealer to their Ally account.

post.summary: Fetch a number of high-level statistics regarding for the dealer.

200.description: A key-value store containing the dealers workplan and sale information.

next_meeting_scheduled_on.description: Date of the next scheduled meeting

next_meeting_time.description: Time of day the next scheduled meeting is to appear

next_meeting_description.example: Meet at South West Hotel for Wholesale Dealership for south west area

post.summary: Fetch communication view for the dealer.

200.description: A key-value store containing the dealers communication view.

record_id.description: Record Id, Email ID, Call ID

type.description: Item type can be: n as note ie as incoming email oe as outgoing email

post.summary: Close a Workplan activity. Optionally you can also add a note if you provide dealer_id, note_type_id, and the text contents.
Get available email dealer email list.
Get available list of email message templates.

success.description: In the event of success this is always true.

Error.description: In the event of an error this structure will be returned.

success.description: In the event of an error this is always false.

message.description: The content of the error message to display to the user.

success.description: Always true, if data is being returned. Otherwise, see Error.

Generic.description: The standard response used by most services. Consists of an object with a success property. See Error schema for format when an error occurs.

GridResponse.description: Generic response used for returning a list of objects.

redirect_url.description: Web URL to redirect the user to. Hertz users, dealer users, and mobile users are all   referred to different UI's depending on where they're logging in from. Client is free to ignore this.

example.content: This is an incoming text message between Dealer 1 and Rep 2.
This is an outgoing test message between Dealer 1 and Rep 1.

eligible.description: Y or N indicating if the account is eligible.

dealership.description: The name of the dealership associated with the requested account, according to Ally.

address.description: The address of the dealership associated with the requested account, according to Ally.

city.description: The city of the dealership associated with the requested account, according to Ally.

state.description: The state of the dealership associated with the requested account, according to Ally.

do_not_email.description: A status contact is in the special do not email list.

system_f.description: Flag shows is it system teplate or not

is_archived_f.description: If email is archived by contact
If email is archived by contact
If email is archived by contact

email_status_c.description: Flag shows email status as draft, sent or incoming
